junior year courses My courses this year will follow three themes
  1. Computability and Efficiency of computability
  2. Programming Languages
  3. Using probability and statistics in computing

The ones that fall under 1 include -> CS51 -> CS157

The ones that fall under 2 include CS173 -> CS33

The ones that fall under 3 include APMA169, APMA261, CS195F

Also two philosophy courses: PHIL54, seminar on paradoxes?
